translations: vt.最终确定，敲定（finalise 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The European Union is finalising rules that will apply next year.
sentences.translation: 欧盟的相关准则也尘埃落定，并将于下一年正式生效。

sentences.sentence: The department is now finalising its analysis of the trial and will be discussing with internet providers how to implement the system.
sentences.translation: 内务部正在赶制公测分析，同时将与网络提供商讨论如何推行该项系统。
